properties.displayName: Potential Credential Dumping Via LSASS Process Clone
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where FolderPath endswith "\\Windows\\System32\\lsass.exe" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\Windows\\System32\\lsass.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects a suspicious LSASS process process clone that could be a sign of credential dumping activity
